page.title: 17Customs in Brompton on Swale
page.content: {Harvest}is in October.Brompton on Swale has a Harvest Supper in the village hall.There is also a Festival in the church where we take fruit and vegetables to be blessed. {Halloween}is on 31st October.We dress up in witches costumes and go to peoples houses and sing "The sky is blue,the grass is green,please can I have a penny for Halloween." {Mischief Night}is on 4th November when children go around doing naughty things like knocking on peoples doors and running away.The next night is Guy Fawkes when there is a big bonfire and fireworks near the river. Near{Christmas}many people go round the village singing{carols.}Afterwards we go to the Post Office where there is a christmas tree decorated with lights.We are given mince pies to eat and drinking chocolate.
